page.title: 14LEVEN VALLEY-AMENITIES
page.content: AMENITIES THE FEW AMENITIES ONCE AVAILABLE HAVE DECREASED e.g.,NOW NO TRAVELLING SHOPS.PEOPLE NOW USUALLY TRAVEL ONCE OR TWICE WEEKLY TO GLENROTHES,SHOPPING IN MULTIPLES e.g.,PRESTO,FINE FARE. ENTERTAINMENT NONE EXISTS IN THIS AREA SO PEOPLE MUST TRAVEL.FOR "LOCAL" ENTERTAINMENT e.g.,S.W.R.I.THEY GO TO THE SMALL SETTLEMENTS OF LESLIE AND KINGLASSIE WHICH ALSO PROVIDE BINGO,CAFES AND HOTELS OFFERING A LIMITED RANGE OF MEALS AND DANCING.GLENROTHES IS THE MAJOR CENTRE WITH PUBS,CINEMA,SNOOKER DISCOS,BINGO,HOTELS AND A WIDE RANGE OF EATING ESTABLISHMENTS PLUS SUPERB SPORTS FACILITIES.UNLESS LOCALS CAN DRIVE,USE OF THESE ENTERTAINMENTS IS LIMITED DUE TO INFREQUENT BUS SERVICES TYPICAL OF RURAL AREAS.OTHERWISE THEY HAVE TO WATCH TELEVISION.
